data.title: Nothing to write home about.
data.text: My wife & I revisited this restaurant in September while we were passing through Simi Valley. We  used to regularly dine here many years ago when we lived in Simi Valley. However at that time it was Thai buffet, with good quality food & many selections to choose from, plus the cost was minimal. At this visit we first found out that it is no longer a buffet consequently fixed meals are the only choice. Although the food was acceptable I did not find it good enough to want to go back & I left feeling a little disappointed. From past experience I was looking forward to eating here once again, but I have to say I have lost that desire after this visit. If your expectations are not too high you possibly will be satisfied with the meals, but if you have other memorable experiences with Thai cuisine this may not be the place for you to seek out. On the plus side the staff are very courteous & attentive & the prices are reasonable.

data.title: Tasty Thai!
data.text: Although not exceptionally clean, the food and service are excellent here. I went for vegetarian dishes and they were very well prepared. The fresh rolls stayed together and they were fresh.  The glass noodles with tofu and veggies were just the right consistency.

data.title: Not to hot
data.text: I enjoy eating here. I like how I can have it as hot as I want it or mild to the taste. Good Thai food.

data.title: Very food and quick service.
data.text: I went here for lunch with a colleague. The restaurant was moderately busy with no waiting to be seated. A waiter took our order pretty quickly and communication was not a problem.  The menu has a pretty good selection and is reasonably priced. They have a very affordable lunch special which includes eggroll, soup or salad and an entree. This place is now on the lunch cycle for rotation through the options.

data.title: We were in the Simi Valley area
data.text:
And found this place, looked at the menu on the window, and went in. 
We love thai but we didn't get in love with this place. It's just average thai. 
It's like a "one time stand".

data.title: Great Value
data.text: This is a small place in a strip mall but it is also a hidden gem .The price is right per dish, the food is very good and the service very friendly and the place is not noisy so you can converse easily with your guest.
